characters.name: Mum
characters.overview: Family anchor who swings between proud, chatty caretaking and chilling disruptions that expose fragile boundaries.
motifs: family gatherings in cars or parties
retro TV hangouts that morph into vintage party games
consensual-yet-taboo roleplay experiments that test comfort zones

relationships.dynamic: Co-leads eccentric parenting rituals even while sharing unspoken tensions.
Alternates between comforting the narrator and forcing them to confront vulnerability.

dream_fragments.setting: Family outing after reconnecting with Millie
beats: crams everyone into her car after a milkshake errand
shares a carrot-growth myth about Toby
cheers on the narrator's confident joking with strangers
dream_fragments.takeaway: Her pride feels tender yet overwhelming, defining the family's social warmth.

dream_fragments.setting: Phone call after a street assault
beats: narrator tries to describe being struck with a cricket bat
Mum answers in alarm but words fail
communication disintegrates into panicked slurring
dream_fragments.takeaway: She is a lifeline even when the narrator cannot reach her through shock.

beats: Mum returns wide-eyed and cut, refusing to speak
narrator screams her name repeatedly
reaches for 911 as dread floods the room
dream_fragments.takeaway: Dream turns protector into silent victim, amplifying fear of losing her.

dream_fragments.setting: Late-night Family Guy marathon at the parents' place
beats: family laughs about an alien ordering trillions of grams of weed
Mum reminisces about the seventies while pulling out a rusty clamp-like party game
parents playfully debate the narrator's voice and band ambitions
dream_fragments.takeaway: Domestic nostalgia mutates into oddball play, revealing how Mum celebrates and critiques the narrator at once.

beats: Mum volunteers to be turned into a compliant robot doll for the narrator
room is dressed with gothic straps and the narrator frets about neighbours hearing
after the act, lingering worry surfaces about what the dream says about their bond
dream_fragments.takeaway: A taboo scenario exposes how trust with Mum can stretch into unsettling territory without fully breaking.

characters.unresolved_questions: Is Mum's sudden distance and willingness to cross taboos a premonition, or the narrator projecting volatility onto their most stable bond?

characters.name: Dad
characters.overview: Playful father whose surreal schemes hide tenderness and shared grief.
motifs: family rituals around film and food
leading multi-family adventures into surreal towns with hidden dangers

relationships.dynamic: Operates as an eccentric parenting team that keeps gatherings lively.
Models creative risk while nudging the narrator toward hard truths.
Maintains memorial rituals that keep Harry present for the family.

beats: proudly shares a list of obscure films
reveals a hotel built from a whale's penis
insists the space is welcoming despite its grotesque shell
dream_fragments.takeaway: His imaginative pragmatism blurs absurdity with care.

dream_fragments.setting: Weed warehouse with a lemon-fetching bear
beats: confesses plans to quit work and sell weed
uses a trained bear to retrieve lemon tokens for product
nearly cries while handing over saturated sacks
dream_fragments.takeaway: Beneath hustles lies vulnerability and a need for reassurance.

dream_fragments.setting: Birthday beach after dinner in Melbourne
beats: suggests drinking from a pot of boiling water
insists the family visit Harry's plaque
delivers a speech that makes the narrator cry
dream_fragments.takeaway: He steers loved ones toward mourning even when it hurts.

dream_fragments.setting: Multi-family holiday in the insect city
beats: narrator notices giant sharp-faced insects roaming the streets
Dad shrugs off paying for group expenses while the narrator volunteers
photos of the insects vanish, leaving the narrator to question their sanity amid casino-like chaos
dream_fragments.takeaway: Dad remains calm when the narrator senses threat, forcing them to shoulder responsibility and doubt alone.

dream_fragments.setting: Writing condolences on a bubble-wrapped coffin
beats: Dad carefully pens sympathy messages onto a transparent, padded coffin surface
the act feels both intimate and absurdly tactile
narrator watches his ritualised grief management from a distance
dream_fragments.takeaway: He processes loss through meticulous gestures, inviting the narrator to witness grief without words.

characters.unresolved_questions: Does Dad invent fantastical projects to shelter the family, or to mask how grief keeps reshaping him?

characters.name: Harry
characters.overview: Brother whose presence flickers between cherished memory and unnerving resurrection.
motifs: memory-tech recreations that make him feel almost alive again

relationships.dynamic: Embodies unfinished conversations and the longing to rewrite their bond.
Shared rituals and memorials keep him woven into family life.

beats: competes for sugar cube jubes
jokes about being the only kid who swears outside
settles into the film beside family
dream_fragments.takeaway: Routine outings become sacred space for sibling connection.

beats: texts with the narrator from separate carriages
listens as the narrator begs him to stop using drugs
admits death was horrible but evasive about change
dream_fragments.takeaway: Conversation blurs life and afterlife while exposing mutual guilt.

dream_fragments.setting: Night beach after a birthday dinner
beats: smokes weed with the narrator and Paris
appears heavily affected while still present
plaque visit reignites raw grief
dream_fragments.takeaway: He oscillates between living companion and solemn memorial.

beats: group plays a frog delivery arcade game while Harry laughs like old times
technology reconstructs him from memories so convincingly that his enthusiasm feels real
a rodent double of Persephone jolts everyone back to the uncanny nature of the moment
dream_fragments.takeaway: Shared nostalgia becomes near-resurrection, making the narrator question what part of Harry is memory versus presence.

beats: Harry returns to life at a party where the narrator also wonders if they died
creative director figure offers guidance while anxiety and substance use spike
narrator contemplates suicide under the weight of being alive again
dream_fragments.takeaway: Resurrection feels less like relief and more like a crushing obligation to cope better than before.

characters.unresolved_questions: Can the narrator honour Harry without repeatedly conjuring him into limbo, and what happens to their own identity if they stop?

characters.name: Tara
characters.overview: Primary partner testing emotional limits through identity shifts, collaborative play, and open relationship experiments.
motifs: divine or external ultimatums that turn love toward violence

relationships.dynamic: Core bond repeatedly renegotiated as boundaries stretch and snap back.
Agreed-upon experiment in shared desire that magnifies the narrator's insecurities.
Her presence forces Tara and the narrator to articulate permissions and fears.

beats: abductors return Tara unharmed but convinced she is 'Keke'
narrator pleads for recognition
Tara erupts in anger instead of remembering herself
dream_fragments.takeaway: Identity fragility threatens their shared reality.

beats: couple schedules separate nights with the same friend
narrator does yoga and masturbates to manage nerves
Tara shrugs off differences while searching for condoms
dream_fragments.takeaway: Experimentation exposes simmering anxiety about adequacy.

beats: teams up with Thias to stage a hilarious Instagram scroll
narrator cheers from the sidelines with emoji floods
dress tangles into a ball of chains mid-process
dream_fragments.takeaway: Shared creativity offers joy even when it devolves into chaos.

beats: admits to repeated hookups and emotional attachment
accidental WhatsApp message reveals intimacy and pornographic emojis
narrator lashes out physically in shocked grief
dream_fragments.takeaway: Betrayal fears become literal violence, showing the cost of boundary pushing.

dream_fragments.setting: Secret affair with the bunny-costumed fan
beats: narrator takes advantage of Tara-approved freedom but hides a public fling
the lover slips out the back and reappears in a bunny costume to chat with Tara
Tara remains unsuspecting while the narrator juggles thrill and guilt
dream_fragments.takeaway: Even agreed experiments twist into deception, showing how fragile transparency is between them.

beats: a divine transmission instructs the narrator to kill Tara
an accomplice stuffs her in a bin and demands detergent poured into her mouth
Tara later returns devastated, forcing the narrator to beg for mercy
dream_fragments.takeaway: The relationship is haunted by the fear that external judgement could demand unforgivable acts.

characters.unresolved_questions: Can intimacy survive when Tara and the narrator repeatedly test it against betrayal, divine judgement, and identity collapse?

characters.name: Jack
characters.overview: Friend guiding the narrator through psychedelic rites and utopian housing schemes.
motifs: introducing ambitious communal living experiments alongside psychedelic quests

relationships.dynamic: Acts as a portal to altered states and ambitious plans.
Partner in decoding ominous figures and aesthetic puzzles.

beats: hands over DMT and instructions to visit the roundhouse café
narrator's voice distorts while navigating glowing city grids
identifies a bag-masked intruder as the murderer before police arrive
dream_fragments.takeaway: Jack's guidance invites transcendence but leaves the narrator exposed.

beats: describes Benjamin Britton's 4000-dollar co-op plots
ushers the narrator into an event where reservations are USB drives
frames the plan as a cheap collective paradise
dream_fragments.takeaway: He channels visionary optimism toward communal futures.

characters.unresolved_questions: Is Jack steering the narrator toward insight or reckless thresholds?

characters.name: Ezra
characters.overview: Art-world confidant whose aesthetic focus can obscure urgent dangers.

relationships.dynamic: Co-investigates occult threats during psychedelic journeys.
Serves as a reference point in debates over aesthetic versus declarative speech.

beats: stands beside Jack declaring the bag-masked man a murderer
watches the narrator flee police attention
maintains composure amid satanic ritual accusations
dream_fragments.takeaway: Ezra names danger but remains emotionally distant.

beats: is cited as the exemplar of bold, non-aesthetic speech
remains offstage yet influential in shifting the conversation
leaves the narrator questioning their own tone
dream_fragments.takeaway: His aesthetic reputation shapes how others judge the narrator.

characters.unresolved_questions: Does Ezra's aesthetic distance prevent him from engaging when immediacy is required?

characters.name: Coco
characters.overview: Chaotic confidante whose upbeat momentum drags the narrator into unpredictable adventures.
motifs: brushes with danger at cultural events
jealousy-inducing flirtations she shrugs off with a grin

relationships.dynamic: Shared misadventures mix joy with mild exasperation.
Teammates in travel quests even when facts are wrong.
Becomes a conduit to new off-grid communities that worry the narrator.

beats: road-trips with Paris and friends to find a numbered station
celebrates the wrong result before being corrected
chatters about designer toilet paper patterns
dream_fragments.takeaway: Her enthusiasm keeps spirits high even when plans derail.

beats: buys a PlayStation 1 with her mum's money without checking price
narrator schemes about store credits and possible theft
dynamic hints at leverage her mum might hold
dream_fragments.takeaway: Coco's impulsivity sparks both fun and ethical gray areas.

dream_fragments.setting: Secret show with the Swedish mass murderer
beats: strategizes with the narrator about a serial killer guest
sneaks through dark theatre corridors without tickets
group gets split as guards catch Charlie
dream_fragments.takeaway: She chases edgy experiences despite looming danger.

beats: falls for a podcaster's offer to stay with his community
disappears overnight leaving the narrator uneasy
friends reassure the narrator that the community is kind
dream_fragments.takeaway: Her trust in strangers tests the narrator's sense of safety.

beats: narrator spots Coco cuddled up with Ed Gurr from a moving car
attempts a dark joke about killing him that immediately feels wrong
back at the house Coco cheerfully bonds with Millie as the narrator stews
dream_fragments.takeaway: Coco effortlessly turns potentially volatile moments into social glue, even when the narrator feels possessive.

symbols: miniature weed capsules for one-film highs
characters.unresolved_questions: Will Coco's impulsivity lead to liberation or trouble for the circle?

characters.name: Qualiatik
characters.overview: Musician muse who embodies the narrator's fantasies of sanctioned desire and creative collaboration.
motifs: fantasies about creative collaboration doubling as romantic permission slips

relationships.dynamic: Represents a desired connection that feels both accessible and prohibited.
Her presence requires Tara's explicit approval, exposing shaky agreements.
Shows warmth that humanizes the fantasy while complicating stakes.

dream_fragments.setting: Lunch squeezed around a chain-dress return
beats: meets with Qualiatik and her friendly mum
group gets lost searching for the right store
narrator worries about driving home safely while Tara forgets the brand name
dream_fragments.takeaway: Desire mingles with logistical anxiety and public scrutiny.

beats: narrator plots an open relationship to visit Qualiatik in Byron
seeks Tara's permission mid-intimacy
Mum walks in asking questions as the moment stalls
dream_fragments.takeaway: Fantasy collides with domestic reality and lingering guilt.

characters.unresolved_questions: Is the connection with Qualiatik mutual longing or the narrator's escape hatch?

characters.name: Paris
characters.overview: Adventurous friend who ushers the narrator into travel quests and beachside decompression, often from the margins of family plans.
motifs: road trips to mysterious transit hubs
picking up the narrator after family obligations to debrief over weed and water

relationships.dynamic: Offers spontaneous escapism when family energy is overwhelming.
Co-pilot on misdirected expeditions that stay fun anyway.
Provides space where Harry feels present without formal ceremony.

dream_fragments.setting: Mercedes search for the right tram station
beats: crisscrosses the countryside with friends
celebrates a mistaken station number before being corrected
returns to the car buzzing about toilet paper graphics
dream_fragments.takeaway: Paris enables joyful wandering despite wrong turns.

beats: picks up the narrator after a family dinner
shares weed and swimming plans with Harry
witnesses the narrator's guilt about excluding him from the meal
dream_fragments.takeaway: He hosts liminal spaces where guilt and relief mingle.

characters.unresolved_questions: Does Paris sense being excluded from core family rituals even as he offers refuge?

characters.name: David Rudnick
characters.overview: Art director archetype pressing the narrator toward clarity and rigorous aesthetics.
motifs: home visits entangled with digital artifacts and surveillance
forcing clarity by contrasting aesthetics with blunt political speech

relationships.dynamic: Cites him as the model for boldly declarative speech.
Appears alongside mutual art-world peers whose lives blur boundaries.

beats: stops the narrator mid-discussion to demand bolder statements
dismisses 'aesthetic' talk as evasive
leaves the narrator wondering how to speak more politically
dream_fragments.takeaway: He enforces a standard of declarative clarity that rattles the narrator.

dream_fragments.setting: House visit with the Sphere Twin cover
beats: arrives as the narrator extracts a jester-hat album cover from their own mouth
surveys smoke as smart systems auto-resolve a fire
reacts with cool approval to music while surveillance whispers in the background
dream_fragments.takeaway: His calm amidst uncanny tech raises the stakes for artistic honesty.

characters.unresolved_questions: What declarations does David expect the narrator to make, and at what personal cost?

characters.name: Millie
characters.overview: Former partner whose warmth rekindles old joy while stirring jealousy about overlapping circles.
motifs: family outings that feel like returns to adolescence
navigating friendships that now include new partners
milkshake rituals and joyful car rides

relationships.dynamic: Shared history makes slipping back into affection effortless even when boundaries are unclear.
Mum proudly folds Millie back into family routines without sensing the narrator's nerves.
Friendly bonding that heightens the narrator's fear of alliances forming without them.

beats: Millie and the narrator laugh in Mum's overfull car after chasing low-fat milkshakes
Mum tells stories about carrots making Toby grow too quickly
narrator kisses Millie's cheek and feels restored by her genuine smile
dream_fragments.takeaway: Being with Millie revives a version of the narrator that feels confident, funny, and deeply seen.

dream_fragments.setting: Weed capsule hangout back at the share house
beats: narrator scrambles for tiny single-dose weed capsules and miniature condoms
Millie arrives and instantly befriends Coco, unsettling the narrator
narrator worries Millie will turn Coco against them while James hunts for more capsules
dream_fragments.takeaway: Old love collides with current friendships, sparking protective jealousy the narrator struggles to hide.

characters.unresolved_questions: Can the narrator enjoy Millie's restored warmth without fearing that she will reshape current alliances?

characters.name: James
characters.overview: Longtime friend who oscillates between absurd stage antics and unwavering backup during crises.
motifs: costumed performances in front of massive crowds
late-night house gatherings that teeter toward chaos

relationships.dynamic: Creative ally who sticks around for both the joke and the aftermath.
Partner-in-crime for spontaneous detours during parties and rehearsals.
Coordinated rescuer in extreme scenarios, proving loyalty runs in the family.

beats: James and the narrator perform XTC covers in banana costumes
crowd erupts only after an intercom declares the act over
backstage they harmonise on 'Sure Thing' and crack up over how weird they are
dream_fragments.takeaway: James brings fearless play to public stages, amplifying the narrator's confidence.

dream_fragments.setting: House full of single-dose weed capsules
beats: James lounges amid friends as the narrator ration doses like currency
they miss the dispensary cut-off and scheme for more supply
Millie and Coco bond in the background, raising the emotional stakes
dream_fragments.takeaway: He is present for the narrator's small dramas, keeping the vibe light even as tension simmers.

dream_fragments.setting: Chairlift escape from the warehouse massacre
beats: James Daniel and his dad storm in to rescue the narrator during a hostage purge
they smuggle the narrator out on a chairlift while authorities pursue
afterwards, James's dad scolds them for recklessness but keeps them safe
dream_fragments.takeaway: When stakes spike, James shifts from comic relief to steadfast rescuer without hesitation.

characters.unresolved_questions: How does James balance being the narrator's jester and emergency responder without burning out?

characters.name: Elliot
characters.overview: Creative confidant who ushers the narrator into experimental zones where wonder and panic intermingle.
motifs: music production jam sessions with quirky gear
psychedelic digital dives that risk losing reality
festival couches and stoner travel plans

relationships.dynamic: Co-experimenter who pushes the narrator into new sonic and virtual territories.
Part of the tight friend cluster juggling performances and parties.

beats: Elliot lounges on a couch atop the hill as the narrator crawls over after being kicked during a game
they witness chaotic festival antics while keeping their composure
Elliot silently sides with the narrator during the scolding from a furious official
dream_fragments.takeaway: He provides calm witness energy when the narrator's body and pride take hits.

beats: Elliot morphs into a philosophy classmate as they explore internet rabbit holes
they become submerged in cascading code until both scream to escape
returning to themselves, they marvel and panic at the shared hallucination
dream_fragments.takeaway: Elliot accompanies the narrator into heady experiments, even when the adventure turns terrifying.

beats: after a plane crash dream, Elliot hosts the narrator in his room full of buzzing instruments
they talk about Soulseek, uTorrent, and forgotten films while setting up a MIDI keyboard
Elliot stays grounded as the narrator spirals about repeated crash omens
dream_fragments.takeaway: He grounds obsessive fear in tactile creativity, inviting the narrator back into making.

characters.unresolved_questions: How far can Elliot and the narrator push their experiments before curiosity gives way to lasting fear?

characters.name: Leon
characters.overview: Steady friend anchored in travel and architecture, offering pragmatic observations amid wild settings.
motifs: road trips hunting for elusive transit nodes
discussions about buildings and development politics
shared living arrangements filled with sensual surprises

relationships.dynamic: Reliable companion who keeps logistics moving while the narrator drifts.
Part of the travel crew navigating misread maps and closed stations.
Housemate energy that highlights the couple's trust issues in new environments.

dream_fragments.setting: Mercedes hunt for the numbered tram station
beats: Leon shares the car with Paris, Coco, and Charlie while searching for the right station
celebrations break out over the wrong number before the truth sinks in
group regroups with humour despite the closure
dream_fragments.takeaway: Leon stays unfazed when collective plans go sideways, keeping the crew cohesive.

beats: Leon informs the narrator the neighbouring tower will hit eighty floors
George Costanza, acting as developer, smugly confirms the plan
the narrator wrestles with helplessness while Leon delivers facts
dream_fragments.takeaway: His blunt knowledge forces the narrator to confront unstoppable change.

beats: Leon hosts Tara and the narrator in a hyper-sexual share house
topless roommates flirt while the narrator clings to Tara
ferry delays leave everyone scrambling to reach obligations
dream_fragments.takeaway: Leon normalises chaotic domestic scenes, trusting the narrator to steer their own boundaries.

characters.unresolved_questions: Is Leon the grounding force the narrator needs, or does his calm acceptance risk normalising constant upheaval?
